name: Burger Simulator 2018
description:
This is the software part of my Final Year Project, titled "An Investigation into the effectiveness of Virtual Reality in Workplace Training". A small VR kitchen environment is featured, with a simple training procedure on cooking burgers based on randomly generated orders.

Only used with the Vive, Oculus/other headset support unknown.

Paper available at request from ashpemberton@zangetsugames.me
